Sentencas: The 'redox' tolerance of a typical anode supported cell was evaluated for three temperatures of re-oxidation.
Titulo: Ni-8YSZ cermet re-oxidation of anode supported solid oxide fuel cell: From kinetics measurements to mechanical damage prediction

Sentencas: For this purpose, an experimental work has been coupled to a modelling approach to estimate the risk of electrolyte failure during re-oxidation.
Titulo: Ni-8YSZ cermet re-oxidation of anode supported solid oxide fuel cell: From kinetics measurements to mechanical damage prediction

Sentencas: A special attention has been paid to take into account both (i) the heterogeneity of oxidation and (ii) the cermet visco-plasticity in operation.
Titulo: Ni-8YSZ cermet re-oxidation of anode supported solid oxide fuel cell: From kinetics measurements to mechanical damage prediction

Sentencas: Data required for the simulations - i.e. the oxidation kinetics rates, the cermet expansions and Young's modulus - were determined at T = 600, 700 and 800 degrees C. It has been found that the activation energy related to the kinetics of re-oxidation encounters a modification at high temperature (700-750 degrees C).
Titulo: Ni-8YSZ cermet re-oxidation of anode supported solid oxide fuel cell: From kinetics measurements to mechanical damage prediction

Sentencas: This modification has been ascribed to a transition from a homogeneous oxidation process to a heterogeneous one.
Titulo: Ni-8YSZ cermet re-oxidation of anode supported solid oxide fuel cell: From kinetics measurements to mechanical damage prediction

Sentencas: Local X-ray measurements have confirmed that an oxidation gradient in the cermet arises at T = 800 degrees C. Mechanical analysis has shown that the presence of an oxidised front at T = 800 degrees C: strongly impacts the cell 'redox' tolerance.
Titulo: Ni-8YSZ cermet re-oxidation of anode supported solid oxide fuel cell: From kinetics measurements to mechanical damage prediction

Sentencas: Indeed, this phenomenon induces a significant cell bending, which adds a compressive stress component to the thin electrolyte.
Titulo: Ni-8YSZ cermet re-oxidation of anode supported solid oxide fuel cell: From kinetics measurements to mechanical damage prediction

Sentencas: simulations have been carried out to determine both critical degree of oxidation and durations before electrolyte cracking.
Titulo: Ni-8YSZ cermet re-oxidation of anode supported solid oxide fuel cell: From kinetics measurements to mechanical damage prediction

Sentencas: The effect of the cermet creep during operation on the cell 'redox' tolerance is also discussed.
Titulo: Ni-8YSZ cermet re-oxidation of anode supported solid oxide fuel cell: From kinetics measurements to mechanical damage prediction
